pullrequest.title: Issue#96 Add Thrust Angle and Rotation Joint

content.raw: I have implemented the PID force method in [0437021](#!/osrf/vrx/commits/043702102adc09fd8168593b63ee96b9f3e5fee1?at=default). I tuned the PID controller to respond quite quickly. Overall I believe it is the more “correct” solution, as SetPosition\(\) for the old Gazebo version might reset the velocity of the joint to 0 each update.
content.html: I have implemented the PID force method in 0437021. I tuned the PID controller to respond quite quickly. Overall I believe it is the more “correct” solution, as SetPosition() for the old Gazebo version might reset the velocity of the joint to 0 each update.
